parameters.content:
# Video Generation Orchestration v2

Supports:
- Multiple ratios per job
- Platform-specific banners via ffmpeg
- Organic templates (no banners)

## Loop through ratios
Each ratio gets its own Creatomate render

## Add platform banners
ffmpeg API adds banners per platform

parameters.query:
SELECT
  p.full_name,
  p.display_name,
  p.voice_id,
  p.voice_settings,
  a.photo_avatar_id,
  a.motion_avatar_id
FROM avatars a
JOIN persons p ON a.person_id = p.id
WHERE a.id = '{{ $("Webhook").first().json.body.avatar_id }}'::uuid

SELECT rendered_urls 
FROM client_backgrounds 
WHERE id = '{{ $("Webhook").first().json.body.background_id }}'::uuid

SELECT cb.rendered_urls
FROM templates t
LEFT JOIN client_backgrounds cb
  ON cb.client_id = '{{ $("Webhook").first().json.body.client_id }}'::uuid
  AND cb.category = TRIM(BOTH '"' FROM t.bg_wide_override::text)
  AND cb.is_default = true
WHERE t.code = UPPER(REPLACE(REPLACE('{{ $("Webhook").first().json.body.template_id }}', 'ad-', ''), 'organic-', ''))
AND t.bg_wide_override IS NOT NULL

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "mode": "pack",
  "theme_seed": "{{ $json.theme_pack.theme_seed || $json.theme_seed || 'Fresh Deals' }}",
  "emoji": "{{ $json.theme_pack.emoji || $json.emoji || 'ðŸš—' }}",
  "direction": "{{ $json.theme_pack.direction || $json.direction || '' }}",
  "local_override_text": "{{ $json.theme_pack.local_override_text || $json.local_override_text || null }}",
  "location": "{{ $json.location }}",
  "service_area": "{{ $json.service_area }}",
  "current_date": "{{ $now.format('yyyy-MM-dd') }}",
  "current_month": "{{ $now.format('MMMM') }}",
  "item_summary": "{{ $json.template_id.includes('educational') ? 'Educational/organic video - Capitol Smarts style. No specific vehicles. Focus on helpful car-buying or ownership advice.' : $json.vins.length + ' vehicles: ' + $json.vins.join(', ') }}"
}

parameters.query:
SELECT 
  prompt_content->'identity'->>'service_area' as service_area,
  prompt_content->'identity'->>'location' as location,
  prompt_content->'identity'->>'business_name' as business_name
FROM client_prompts
WHERE client_id = '{{ $json.client_id }}'::uuid
AND prompt_type = 'base'
